full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL LHA GZHI BDAG 'GA' ZHIG LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL LHA MI 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES YUL LHA GZHI BDAG 'GA' ZHIG LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL LHA MI 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS 'BYOR BAS PHYUGS PA'I DAm LDAN BAN DHE RGYAN MTSAN GYIS AU TSUGS NAN TAN MTHAR SKYEL GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^RIG PA 'DZIN PA MKHA' 'GRO DGYES PA'I RDO RJES SBYAR 'DI RIGS DGOS PA CHUNG NA'ANG DENG DUS MCHOG DMAN KUN GYIS NYAMS LEN GYI GTZO BOR LHA KLU MCHOD PA BZHIS LUGS SU GYUR NA'ANG, DBYINGS MI PHYED @004B PAR BLA MA DKON MCHOG DANG BSTES STE, DA DUNG LHA KLU DANG GTZO BOR BYED KYIS, ,BSANG CHOG 'BREL MED MANG PO DANG, MING GSAL GYI CHOG RE GNYIS YOD KYANG, 'GO MJUG MED PA'I ZLUM ZLUM RIL RIL MO ZHIG BKLAG NAS PHAN DU RE ZHING, YANG LHA KLU MCHOD PAR CHED DU GNYER BA'I BZA' BTUNG LA SPYOD PAR SEMS PA'I GTI THUG CAN TSOR YANG PHAN PA SRID SNYAM GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BGYIS PA'I SE'I PA'ANG BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,)
